nvdm2¶

smote_likes.distance_metrics.nvdm2(X: numpy.ndarray, Y: numpy.ndarray, cond_proba_list: list) → list[source]¶

Calculate the nvdm2 between two observations \(\sum_{c=1}^{C} \left | P_{a,x,c} - P_{a,y,c} \right |^2\) for c classes and a attributes

Parameters

  • X (numpy.ndarray) – The row-vector with all attributes of one observation

  • Y (numpy.ndarray) – The row-vector with all attributes of another observation

  • cond_proba_list (list of dict) – List of dicts of conditional probabilities

Returns

list – The individual distances between any two attributes of the observations.
